WRITING.TITLE: Covering self-injury scars?
WRITING.TEXT: I've been a self-injurer for about seven years. For a long time I worked very hard to cover up the scars and cuts. But recently it's become too difficult to cover up every inch of my skin so I've become pretty lax with it. I've even gone out in short sleeved shirts with cuts open and visible on my arm. But I feel a little guilty about doing this sometimes. And I know people have criticized self-injurers who don't cover up as irresponsible or something. And I know it makes some people uncomfortable to see them. I've kind of reached this point where I don't give a lot of fucks about who sees them or what they think but there are times where I feel like I should cover-up. Basically am I under any oblation to hide them, or should I continue to not give any fucks about who sees them? (And please don't preach at me, I have a therapist, I'm getting help, But I'm not ready to stop, as of yet, I don't know if I will be or not but please, just don't preach at me, lets just focus on the question at hand)

WRITING.TITLE: What's really 'wrong' with self-harm?
WRITING.TEXT: I've been a SIer for about seven years. And the idea of quitting really scares the hell out of me. Just the thought of putting it down and never ever harming again puts me in a panic thinking about it. But I'm just wondering what's really wrong with doing it. I'm not hurting anyone else. I'm safe about it. I'm just not sure why I should stop. I'm sorry, I'm not trying to be a dick, I'm just wondering why I should stop.

WRITING.TITLE: Me and some friends at Denver pride!(I'm last one on the right)
Why do I keep doing this to myself?
How do you deal with things when all you want to do is curl up in bed and die?
WRITING.TEXT: I need to deal with my life. School, work, relationships. But there are so many days where I just don't feel like I can deal with anything. Even things I like. I just don't feel like doing anything much less the things I have to do. I've missed a few days of school and work because of this. And today was one of those days. All I want to do is crawl back to bed and never wake up. I just don't know if I can handle anything today? How am I supposed to live like this? How can I pass my classes? Or keep my job? Or my friends? I'm so fucking tired of everything, I just don't know how I'm going to make it through today. Or god forbid any other bad days. I just want to be okay.

WRITING.TITLE: Sudden clarity clarence watches daytime TV.
My girlfriends reaction to No Shave November
I don't always wear heels but when I do...
I was having a bad day. Come home from work to this. My girlfriend is amazing.
Started medication. Getting better but still experiencing a lot of the symptoms. Should I talk to my doc about the dose?
WRITING.TEXT: I'm on 20 mgs of Citalopram. The meds seem to be helping somewhat. What used to be my good days are now my bad days. But I'm still having a lot of the symptoms. On my bad days I have a lot of trouble getting out of bed. I still get headaches and aches. My girlfriend thinks I should talk to my doctor about upping the dose. Any ideas? Edit* I've been on Citalopram for a little over two months.

WRITING.TITLE: Growing some balls rage.
Thoughts I have whilst cuddling with my girlfriend.
Maybe I should have but I'm glad I didn't.
One week after seven years. How do you fight the urges?
WRITING.TEXT: As the title says I've been free for a week after seven years of cutting. And I'm looking for ways to help me fight the urges. I write and exercise, but I'm looking for more. The urges where awful today. I even got a new pack of razors. I was out shopping for some things I needed and I couldn't help but just look and ended up taking the pack. I need more ways to deal with them, they get pretty bad. I'm thinking about taking some of your guys' ideas and making a list. Thanks in advance.

WRITING.TITLE: I really need some help(Post suicide attempt)
WRITING.TEXT: So I tried to kill myself. I ended up in the hospital and then spent a week in inpatient. They changed my meds to 40 mg of celxa and 1 mg of risperdal(for anxiety) I've also been a cutter for seven years and I'm trying to quit. Was 2 weeks free(not including the hospital stay) and slipped up. Now I've been free a week. I'm still struggling with some of the symptoms. Still feel depressed sometimes, think about suicide, low energy. I've was on 20 mg for celxa for about three months before the suicide attempt in early February then they put me on 40. I've also been having issues sexually after i was discharged. I haven't had any desire whatsoever. Now I know celxa can cause that but I was on 40 mg in the hospital and when my gf would visit the hardest part was we couldn't have sex. Could it be the risperdal? Should I talk to my doctor about changing anti-depressents? Because, as I said before I'm still struggling with the symptoms. And what about my sex drive will it come back or should I talk to my doctor about that as well? Thank you so much in advance I really need some advise.

WRITING.TITLE: Making a cup of coffee rage.
Looking for some ideas.
WRITING.TEXT: I'm trying to look more androgynous. I identify as a woman and I look pretty feminine. I'm also very busty and want to bind, but I don't want to be totally flat. Just so I can pull off a more androgynous look. Here's a picture. Any advice? http://i.imgur.com/yC3AIDV.jpg?1

WRITING.TITLE: Mom and Dad,
WRITING.TEXT: First off I'm sorry. I'm sorry for all thing things I put you through. I know how much of a screw up I am, believe me I know. I'm sorry for all the secrets I kept and the lies I told, but you have to understand that I did it because I had to. The hardest things to say are the words that mean the most. I didn't know how to tell you what I was feeling, I didn't know how to explain it. And there are still some things that I can't tell you. You found out about all the things I've been struggling with for years in a day. I was self harming at 13. And my first thought of suicide was 11. But I hid it all for almost 10 years, becasue I had to. How to you tell someone those thing. I was so afraid that if you found out you would lock me away. Now that you know you don't trust me with anything, you treat me like a crazy person that has to be checked in on every few moments. I still have to hide my eating disorder from you, becasue I'm so afraid you won't trust me with food. You'll worry everything I eat or don't eat, every time I go to the bathroom. I just don't want you to know, and I'm sorry for keeping it from you. I'm sorry to say that I still think about killing myself, I mean 10 years of planning my own death doesn't really go away in a few months. I just feel like that's my ending. That's the way things have to be. There's just no place in this world for me. And that's the way things have to go. Just please know, that I love you both, and I never wanted to hurt you. I never saw you as the enemy, I just didn't have the courage or the words to tell you these things. And I'm so afraid to tell you becasue I don't want you to worry, and I want you to know that this is the only way I can ever be okay. So just don't be sad, just know it's what I needed and wanted. I love you. Good-bye.

I know people disagree with this. But it's what I think.
Am I the only one who thinks Lana Wachowski is downright adorable?
MRW I go out after not taking my meds for a few days and find myself in a triggering situation.
All these cute pictures just make me cry more. Please come home, Watson.
MRW someone says "You'd be really pretty if..."
MRW the person interviewing me says "Oh, are you the one who handed in their resume on pink paper?"
MRW I give my number to a coworker in case he needs his shift covered and I start getting gross, creepy texts from him.
I thought I'd share my glorious collection of cat things.
Someone gifted me with reddit gold and now I'm just like....
MRW I realize it's October
I'm giving my brother's cat belly rubs(his favorite thing in the world) when suddenly he starts giving me the angry tail
My(non-vegan)brother's reaction to pretty much everything I make...
A few years back I went to a museum with my friend who asked me this. The kicker is I'm a lesbian. If anyone had an excuse it's me.
As a person who lives with depression and chronic pain. This is MRW when I get my period.
MRW my Doctor tells me my eating disorder 'wasn't all bad' because I was loosing weight.
Nice timing you two!
MRW the cute new girl at work(who I'm getting serious gay vibes from)says "You're not one of those people who just plays video games all the time right?"
My blunder years. I regret a little.
Every night when I think about my future(or lack thereof)
Wear it like armor, and it can never be used to hurt you.
After I posted a vegan comment in a non-vegan thread.
MRW someone says I'm 'too old' to wear Nightmare Before Christmas swag
MRW I go on a date and she says "I think it's cool you don't feel like you have to dress up for me" and I'm wearing heals, a dress, and make-up.
When I'm buying a bunch of ps3 games becasue the price had dropped and the dude behind the counter says "Wow, you're like the best girlfriend ever!"
I had a 2:30am shift this morning and didn't get off until 1pm. MRW I get home.
To the Redditor who's friends call birth control a "hassle".
Thought I'd share my Imbolc altar setup.
I work at target. MRW I get on reddit after I get home.
Ouch. Now it hurts even when I walk a little too quickly
MRW a cis dude tells me he wants to write a book about trans women.
I want to cut again. I miss it.
WRITING.TEXT: I've been free for 6 months, almost 7. I want to do it again. I just miss the feeling. Nothing is really wrong. I'm not even really depressed anymore. But I still deal with suicidal thoughs, cutting used to help, for lack of a better word, quiet those thoughts. I know eventually I will kill myself. I just want to keep level for a while, I have to live my life until then.
